description:
go-tour: minor HTML/link error fixes
        Fix issue 3421 for the go project.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5946048/diff/2002/static/index.html
File static/index.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5946048/diff/2002/static/index.html#newcode10
static/index.html:10: <link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Droid+Serif&v1' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
just drop the &v1 from these URLs

PTAL.
On 2012/03/29 22:43:56, adg wrote:
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5946048/diff/2002/static/index.html#newcode10
> static/index.html:10: <link
> href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Droid+Serif&v1'
> rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
> just drop the &v1 from these URLs
Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=aa521fb7c7db ***

go-tour: minor HTML/link error fixes
        Fix issue 3421 for the go project.

R=golang-dev, adg, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5946048

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 5946048: go-tour: minor HTML/link error fixes
